attributes.action: Release UK vaccine supply contracts between government and Pfizer, Moderna & J&J
attributes.additional_details: To build trust the government should make these details public
attributes.background:
I would like the government to make public the full supply contracts that have been made between the UK government and Pfizer, Moderna and J&J 
Including details of supply, payment, penalties and all other further conditions of supply

rejection.details:
You can find out how to make a freedom of information request here: 
https://www.gov.uk/make-a-freedom-of-information-request
